mapper.select:
SELECT tf.employee_id, tf.employee_name, sum( tf.te_money ) AS te_money, sum( tf.tezsMoney ) AS tezsMoney, sum( tf.zyMoney ) AS zyMoney, sum( tf.zyzsMoney ) AS zyzsMoney, sum( tf.surplus_money ) AS surplus_money, sum( tf.syzsMoney ) AS syzsMoney, sum( tf.current_expend_money ) AS current_expend_money, sum( tf.dyzyzsMoney ) AS dyzyzsMoney, round( sum( tf.zyMoney ) / sum( tf.te_money ) * 100, 2 ) AS zyRate FROM ( SELECT f.employee_id, f.employee_name, f.te_money, round( ( f.fqqs * ( f.fq_rate / 100 ) * f.te_money ), 2 ) AS tezsMoney, ( f.te_money - IFNULL( f.surplus_money, f.te_money ) ) AS zyMoney, round( ( f.fqqs * ( f.fq_rate / 100 ) * ( f.te_money - IFNULL( f.surplus_money, f.te_money ) ) ), 2 ) AS zyzsMoney, IFNULL( f.surplus_money, f.te_money ) AS surplus_money, round( ( f.fqqs * ( f.fq_rate / 100 ) * IFNULL( f.surplus_money, f.te_money ) ), 2 ) AS syzsMoney, f.current_expend_money, round( ( f.fqqs * ( f.fq_rate / 100 ) * f.current_expend_money ), 2 ) AS dyzyzsMoney FROM ( SELECT j.employee_id, j.employee_name, (IFNULL(j.first_te_money,0) + IFNULL(j.second_te_money,0) ) AS te_money, j.jz_fq_qs AS fqqs, j.jz_fq_rate AS fq_rate, j.surplus_money, jk.current_expend_money FROM jz_base_info AS j LEFT JOIN ( SELECT jk.jz_id, sum( jk.current_expend_money ) AS current_expend_money FROM jz_kyed_info AS jk WHERE #{zyMonth} = date_format( jk.operation_time, '%Y-%m' ) GROUP BY jk.jz_id ORDER BY NULL DESC ) jk ON j.id = jk.jz_id WHERE #{passMonth} = date_format( j.pass_date, '%Y-%m' ) ) f ) tf GROUP BY tf.employee_id,tf.employee_name ORDER BY NULL DESC
limit #{offset},#{limit}

SELECT COUNT( * ) FROM ( SELECT f.employee_id, f.employee_name FROM jz_base_info f WHERE #{passMonth} = date_format( f.pass_date, '%Y-%m' ) GROUP BY f.employee_id, f.employee_name ORDER BY NULL DESC ) p

SELECT b.bank_name, ( SELECT d.text FROM dict d WHERE d.id = b.parent_id AND d.type = 'BANK_INFO' ) AS parentBankName, sum( tf.te_money ) AS te_money, sum( tf.tezsMoney ) AS tezsMoney, sum( tf.zyMoney ) AS zyMoney, sum( tf.zyzsMoney ) AS zyzsMoney, sum( tf.surplus_money ) AS surplus_money, sum( tf.syzsMoney ) AS syzsMoney, sum( tf.current_expend_money ) AS current_expend_money, sum( tf.dyzyzsMoney ) AS dyzyzsMoney, round( sum( tf.zyMoney ) / sum( tf.te_money ) * 100, 2 ) AS zyRate FROM ( SELECT f.bankInfo_id, f.te_money, round( ( f.fqqs * ( f.fq_rate / 100 ) * f.te_money ), 2 ) AS tezsMoney, ( f.te_money - IFNULL( f.surplus_money, f.te_money ) ) AS zyMoney, round( ( f.fqqs * ( f.fq_rate / 100 ) * ( f.te_money - IFNULL( f.surplus_money, f.te_money ) ) ), 2 ) AS zyzsMoney, IFNULL( f.surplus_money, f.te_money ) AS surplus_money, round( ( f.fqqs * ( f.fq_rate / 100 ) * IFNULL( f.surplus_money, f.te_money ) ), 2 ) AS syzsMoney, f.current_expend_money, round( ( f.fqqs * ( f.fq_rate / 100 ) * f.current_expend_money ), 2 ) AS dyzyzsMoney FROM ( SELECT j.bankInfo_id, (IFNULL(j.first_te_money,0) + IFNULL(j.second_te_money,0) ) AS te_money, j.jz_fq_qs AS fqqs, j.jz_fq_rate AS fq_rate, j.surplus_money, jk.current_expend_money FROM jz_base_info AS j LEFT JOIN ( SELECT jk.jz_id, sum( jk.current_expend_money ) AS current_expend_money FROM jz_kyed_info AS jk WHERE #{zyMonth} = date_format( jk.operation_time, '%Y-%m' ) GROUP BY jk.jz_id ORDER BY NULL DESC ) jk ON j.id = jk.jz_id WHERE #{passMonth}= date_format( j.pass_date, '%Y-%m' ) ) f ) tf left join bank_info b on tf.bankInfo_id = b.id GROUP BY tf.bankInfo_id ORDER BY NULL DESC
limit #{offset},#{limit}
SELECT COUNT( * ) FROM ( SELECT f.bankInfo_id FROM jz_base_info f WHERE #{passMonth} = date_format( f.pass_date, '%Y-%m' ) GROUP BY f.bankInfo_id ORDER BY NULL DESC ) p

SELECT id,employee_id,employee_name,jj_type,bankInfo_id,jj_time,customer_name,identity_code,apply_code,contact_number,work_company,house_type,jz_fq_qs,jz_fq_rate,jz_fq_money,jz_sp_money,pass_date,first_te_time,first_te_money,second_te_time,second_te_money,surplus_money,operater,first_zy_flag,second_zy_flag,ed_end_time,card_number,governor,acceptorg,yxqd,is_gd,guidang_date FROM jz_base_info WHERE apply_code=#{applyCode} limit 1
